archimate:Requirement.name: AS.1.3.3a: a) key performance indicators (KPIs): which are often quantitative and objective, reflect past performance and based on metrics that can be aggregated in a statistically valid way (e.g. the number, frequency and business impact of information security incidents; internal and external audit findings; operational security statistics, and costs associated with financial losses, legal or regulatory penalties and fraud)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
